name: get_products
description: This function finds a products that has similar to what the user is asking for.

name_of_product.description: Not mandatory. The name of the product. In case the user didn't specify it in the request, it should be set to null.

quantity_of_product.description: Not mandatory. Quantity of the product. In case the user didn't specify it in the request, it should be set to null.

brand_of_product.description: Not mandatory. Brand of the product. In case the user didn't specify it in the request, it should be set to null.

price.description: Not mandatory. Maximum or minimum price limit. In case the user didn't specify it in the request, it should be set to null.

category.description: Not mandatory. Category of the products. In case the user didn't specify it in the request, it should be set to null.

other_information.description: All other information that the user provided that could potentially help finding the best match.

name: activate_handsfree
description: This function activates a handsfree chat experience where you are always answering by voice to the user interface
